titleStmt.title: Psalter, Sin.Slav.6/N, Monastery of St. Catherine, Mt. Sinai, 11th c., end - 12th c. beginning.
titleStmt.author: Dilyana Radoslavova

supportDesc.condition: The MS is part of the MS 6 (6/O) of the Old collection of the monastery. Contains two unnumbered and separate gatherings and one extra folio in the beginning of the first gathering. The first gathering (f. 1-9) immediately proceeds the corpus of 6/O; the second one (f. 10-17) carries on from the main MS corpus filling up the gap between f. 125 and 126.

decoDesc.p: Red double lined initials with spiral braided ornaments in the beginning of each Psalm and each Canticle.

scribeDesc.summary: The two gatherings are written by two different scribes, identified as Scribe A (f. 1-9) and Scribe C (f. 10-17) from the old MS part (see Altbauer-Lunt 1978).

msContents.summary: Contains Ps.9 - Ps. 17:34 and the Canticles.
